column5: These sure look nice if you have the cash ...
I saw one at the fishing show last year. Made me want to cry.
I posted some pics a few years ago of some that I'd seen at the show in Montreal. They're a nice toy but I don't see them as being very practical unfortunately.
There are some pretty luxurious ice huts listed on this site: http://fishhouseforsale.com/  Fun to look at.
if i was gunna buy a new camper... id get something like this for year round fun... they look sweet..
I think you would not want to leave that on Simcoe unless you were in it, the local loogans would beetle off with that in a heartbeat, or trash it.
Sure would make running and gunning easier!
You might as well just stop at the local Gin Mill and on the way home pick up some fish at the grocery store....
